description: 3D Character Caption Templates for LoRA Training

base_templates.character_detailed: a 3d animated character, {description}, pixar style, high quality render, smooth shading, studio lighting
base_templates.character_scene: 3d animation scene, {character} {action}, {environment}, professional lighting, cinematic composition
base_templates.style_focus: pixar style 3d animation, {description}, photorealistic materials, detailed textures, subsurface scattering

example_prompts.woody: a 3d animated cowboy character, wearing brown vest and blue jeans, friendly smile, pixar style, high quality render, studio lighting
example_prompts.buzz_lightyear: a 3d animated space ranger character, white and green armor, confident expression, pixar style, smooth shading, dramatic lighting
example_prompts.mike_wazowski: a 3d animated green one-eyed monster character, round body, happy expression, pixar style, professional render, colorful background
example_prompts.sulley: a 3d animated blue furry monster character, large build, friendly smile, pixar style, detailed fur textures, soft lighting
example_prompts.nemo: a 3d animated orange clownfish character, small fins, curious expression, pixar style, underwater environment, volumetric lighting
example_prompts.dory: a 3d animated blue tang fish character, yellow tail, cheerful expression, pixar style, ocean background, subsurface scattering

negative_prompts.common: 2d anime, flat shading, low quality, blurry, distorted, deformed, ugly, bad anatomy, extra limbs
negative_prompts.technical: noisy render, artifacts, pixelated, low resolution, poor lighting, flat colors

caption_guidelines.prefix: Always start with 'a 3d animated character' or 'pixar style'
caption_guidelines.consistency: Use same style terminology across dataset
caption_guidelines.specificity: Include key visual features (color, shape, expression)
caption_guidelines.avoid: Don't use 2D anime terms, don't mention frame rate or animation timing
